body: A true primitive has a favored terrain representing her native homeland. This ability functions as the ranger class feature, and the true primitive's bonuses in that terrain improve by +2 at 5th level and every five levels thereafter. However, she does not gain any additional favored terrains. This ability replaces fast movement.
name: Favored Terrain
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Barbarian/Barbarian Archetypes/True Primitive/Favored Terrain
